channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Sales Offline
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Sales Offline

item.title: CVE-2021-2190|2024-08-03T16:32:03.171Z -- oracle%20corporation -- sales%20offline
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Sales Offline product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Template). Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.1-12.1.3 and 12.2.3-12.2.10. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Sales Offline. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of Oracle Sales Offline. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).
